Terms of Service

Please read these terms carefully before using our services.

Last updated: December 2024

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using DevExpress services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

2. Description of Service

DevExpress provides rapid development services including but not limited to:

  • Restaurant menu systems and websites
  • Mobile applications for iOS and Android
  • Android TV applications
  • Custom web applications
  • E-commerce solutions

We commit to delivering completed projects within 24 hours of receiving all necessary requirements and content.

3. User Accounts

To access certain features of our service, you must create an account. You are responsible for:

  • Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
  • All activities that occur under your account
  • Providing accurate and complete information
  • Updating your information as necessary

4. Project Requirements and Delivery

4.1 Project Requirements

To ensure timely delivery, you must provide:

  • Complete project specifications and requirements
  • All necessary content, images, and branding materials
  • Clear communication about desired features and functionality
  • Timely feedback during the development process

4.2 24-Hour Delivery Commitment

Our 24-hour delivery commitment begins once we receive all required materials and confirm project requirements. Delays in providing materials or unclear requirements may extend the delivery timeline.

5. Payment Terms

Payment terms are as follows:

  • Full payment is required before project commencement
  • We accept various payment methods as listed on our website
  • All prices are in Indian Rupees (â‚¹) unless otherwise specified
  • Additional features or revisions may incur additional costs

6. Intellectual Property Rights

6.1 Your Content

You retain ownership of all content you provide, including text, images, logos, and other materials.

6.2 Our Deliverables

Upon full payment, you receive a non-exclusive license to use the delivered project. We retain the right to use the underlying code and technology for other projects, but your specific content and branding remain yours.

7. Revisions and Support

We provide:

  • 30 days of free revisions after project delivery
  • Technical support during the revision period
  • Ongoing support packages available for purchase
  • Bug fixes and security updates as needed

8. Limitation of Liability

DevExpress shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, or use, incurred by you or any third party, whether in an action in contract or tort, even if the other party has been advised of the possibility of such damages.

9. Warranty and Disclaimers

9.1 Service Warranty

We warrant that our services will be performed in a professional manner and in accordance with generally accepted industry standards.

9.2 Disclaimers

We disclaim all other warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.

10. Termination

Either party may terminate this agreement with written notice. Upon termination:

  • You will receive any completed work up to the termination date
  • Refunds will be processed according to our refund policy
  • Your access to our services will be suspended
  • We will retain your data for the period required by law

11. Privacy and Data Protection

Your privacy is important to us. Our collection and use of personal information is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these terms by reference.

12. Governing Law

These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Tech City, India.

13. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

14. Contact Information

If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us:

Email: legal@devexpress.com

Phone: +1 (555) 123-4567

Address: 123 Innovation Drive, Tech City, TC 12345

Ready to Get Started?
